query: Give me a short random joke
key_findings: Generating random jokes requires minimal technical complexity
Multiple approaches exist for joke generation
best_practices: Use reputable joke APIs for diverse content
Implement content filtering for appropriate jokes
Cache joke results to reduce API calls
common_pitfalls: Relying on a single joke source

integration_requirements.authentication: None required for most public joke APIs

performance_considerations: Implement short timeout for joke retrieval
Cache jokes to minimize network requests
